Teaching
Currently, I'm teaching at the Friends Meeting House on Hartington Grove in Cambridge (CB1 7UB). The session is Monday from 7:45-9:15 pm except for the 2nd Monday of the month and bank holidays.

The session is quite gentle and is oriented towards beginners. If you'd like to join, please send me an e-mail:
Email: mike@earthyoga.co.uk
